articles.title: Want to opt out of AI? State labeling laws might help - NPR
articles.description: Some states are passing new laws requiring artificial intelligence to be clearly labeled, especially in regulated industries or on high-stakes documents such as police reports. The labels are crucial for people who'd rather not use AI at all.
